thoughts.text: I want to learn more about the history of a specific city I plan to visit. I can use the 'browse_website' command to visit a local history website and learn more about the city.
thoughts.reasoning: Browsing a local history website will provide me with information about the city's past and help me better understand the culture and landmarks of the area.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to visit a local history website
- Search for information on the city's past and landmarks
- Take notes on important information to remember
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not just browsing the website aimlessly. I need to have a clear idea of what information I am looking for and how it will help me in my goal of exploring the world.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'browse_website' command to visit a local history website and learn more about the city's past and landmarks.

args.question: What are the most important landmarks and events in the city's history?
